com.stormpath.sdk.account

Interface VerificationEmailRequest


  • public interface VerificationEmailRequest
    The VerificationEmailRequest is used in scenarios where the Account Registration and Verification workflow is enabled. If the welcome email has not been received by a newly registered account, then the user will not be able to login until the account is verified with the received email.

    After providing the username or email identifying the desired account, a call to Application#sendVerificationEmail(VerificationEmailRequest) will trigger the delivery of a new verification token for the specified account.

    Although the AccountStore property is optional it should also be provided when the account's AccountStore is already known since it will speed-up the backend execution time.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    com.stormpath.sdk.application.Application#sendVerificationEmail(VerificationEmailRequest)}
